foreignData.flavorText: Verrat und Vergessenheit treffen hier aufeinander.
foreignData.name: Ley-Linie der Leere
foreignData.text:
Falls die Ley-Linie der Leere auf deiner Starthand ist, kannst du die Partie mit ihr im Spiel beginnen.
Falls eine Karte von irgendwoher auf den Friedhof eines Gegners gelegt würde, schicke sie stattdessen ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: Donde la traición y el olvido convergen.
foreignData.name: Línea mística del vacío
foreignData.text:
Si la Línea mística del vacío está en tu mano inicial, puedes comenzar el juego con ella en el campo de batalla.
Si una carta fuera a ir al cementerio de un oponente desde cualquier parte, en vez de eso, exíliala.

foreignData.flavorText: Là où convergent traîtrise et oubli.
foreignData.name: Ligne ley du vide
foreignData.text:
Si la Ligne ley du vide est dans votre main de départ, vous pouvez l'avoir sur le champ de bataille au début de la partie.
Si une carte devait être mise dans le cimetière d'un adversaire d'où qu'elle vienne, exilez-la à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: Il punto d'unione tra tradimento e oblio.
foreignData.name: Leyline del Nulla
foreignData.text:
Se la Leyline del Nulla è nella tua mano iniziale, puoi cominciare la partita con essa sul campo di battaglia.
Se una carta sta per essere messa nel cimitero di un avversario da qualsiasi zona, invece esiliala.

foreignData.flavorText: 不実と忘却の集まるところ。
foreignData.name: 虚空の力線
foreignData.text:
虚空の力線があなたのゲーム開始時の手札にあるなら、あなたはこれが戦場に出ている状態でゲームを開始してもよい。
カードがいずれかの領域から対戦相手の墓地に置かれるなら、代わりにそれを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: Onde a traição e o oblívio convergem.
foreignData.name: Linha de Força do Vácuo
foreignData.text:
Se Linha de Força do Vácuo estiver em sua mão de abertura, você poderá começar o jogo com ela no campo de batalha.
Se um card seria colocado no cemitério de um oponente vindo de qualquer lugar, em vez disso, exile-o.

foreignData.flavorText: Там, где сходятся коварство и забвение.
foreignData.name: Лучи Пустоты
foreignData.text:
Если Лучи Пустоты находятся в вашей начальной руке, вы можете начать партию с ними на поле битвы.
Если карта должна попасть откуда-либо на кладбище оппонента, изгоните ее вместо этого.

foreignData.name: 虚空地脉
foreignData.text:
如果你的起手牌中包含了虚空地脉，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。
如果某张牌将从任何区域置入对手的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

foreignData.name: 虛空地脈
foreignData.text:
如果你的起手牌中包含了虛空地脈，則你可以讓它在戰場上來開始遊戲。
如果某張牌將從任何區域置入對手的墳墓場，則改為將它放逐。

name: Leyline of the Void
originalText:
If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

rulings.text: If your opponent discards a card while you control Leyline of the Void, abilities that check whether a card is discarded (such as Hollow One, or a madness ability of the discarded card) still work, even though that card never reaches that player’s graveyard. In addition, spells or abilities that check the characteristics of the discarded card can find that card in exile.
While Leyline of the Void is on the battlefield, nontoken creatures your opponents control won’t die. They’ll be exiled instead. Abilities that would trigger when those creatures die won’t trigger.
Tokens can still die while Leyline of the Void is on the battlefield.

A player’s “opening hand” is the hand of cards the player has after all players have taken mulligans. If players have any cards in hand that allow actions to be taken with them from a player’s opening hand, the starting player takes all such actions first in any order, followed by each other player in turn order. Then the first turn begins.

text:
If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
